title: MRA Championship Series Announces 2025 Calendar
author: Racing Australia Staff
excerpt: The Motor Racing Australia championship series has unveiled its comprehensive 2025 calendar featuring 8 rounds across Australia's premier racing circuits.
body: Motor Racing Australia has officially announced the 2025 championship calendar, featuring eight exciting rounds across the country's most prestigious racing circuits. The series will visit iconic venues including Mount Panorama, Phillip Island, and Sandown Raceway.

The championship will kick off at Adelaide International Raceway in March, with the season finale scheduled for November at Sydney Motorsport Park. Each round will feature multiple race formats, including sprint races and endurance challenges.

"We're excited to present our strongest calendar yet," said MRA Series Director James Mitchell. "The variety of circuits and race formats will test every aspect of our competitors' skills and provide fantastic entertainment for motorsport fans."

New for 2025 is the introduction of a night race at Eastern Creek, which will be held under lights for the first time in the series' history. This innovative addition is expected to attract significant television and spectator interest.
Registration for the 2025 season opens next month, with early bird pricing available for teams that commit before the end of August.

seo.metaDescription: The Motor Racing Australia championship series has unveiled its comprehensive 2025 calendar featuring 8 rounds across Australia's premier racing circuits.
